title: VS Code Dev Days Nepal
description: 3-hour hands-on workshop on AI-powered development with VS Code + GitHub Copilot. Perfect for students, developers, and AI enthusiasts.

fullDescription.heading: About the Event
fullDescription.content: VS Code Dev Days Nepal was a transformative 3-hour hands-on workshop that brought together students, developers, and AI enthusiasts to explore the cutting-edge world of AI-powered development.

fullDescription.heading: What We Covered
fullDescription.content:
Introduction to VS Code and its ecosystem
AI-powered coding with GitHub Copilot
Best practices for modern development workflows
Hands-on coding sessions and exercises
Q&A session with industry experts

fullDescription.heading: Key Highlights
fullDescription.content: Over 50 participants joined us for this incredible learning experience. The workshop featured live coding demonstrations, interactive sessions, and real-world use cases of AI in software development. Participants learned how to leverage GitHub Copilot to accelerate their coding productivity and write better code.

fullDescription.heading: Feedback
fullDescription.content: The event received overwhelming positive feedback from participants who appreciated the practical approach and hands-on learning experience. Many attendees expressed their enthusiasm about incorporating these tools into their daily development workflow.

title: Friday Forum - Mobile Development in AI Era
description: Building user first Native/Hybrid mobile applications in age of AI. Featuring Mr. Rishav Chudal, Sr. Software Engineer at eSewa.

fullDescription.heading: About the Event
fullDescription.content: Our Friday Forum series continued with an insightful session on Mobile Development in the AI Era. We were privileged to have Mr. Rishav Chudal, Senior Software Engineer at eSewa, share his expertise on building user-first mobile applications.

fullDescription.heading: Session Topics
fullDescription.content:
Current trends in mobile development
Native vs Hybrid approaches
Integrating AI capabilities in mobile apps
User-first design principles
Performance optimization techniques
Best practices from eSewa's development team

fullDescription.heading: Speaker Profile
fullDescription.content: Mr. Rishav Chudal brings extensive experience in mobile development from his work at eSewa, Nepal's leading digital wallet. His insights into building scalable and user-friendly mobile applications were invaluable to our community.

fullDescription.heading: Impact
fullDescription.content: With over 100 attendees joining virtually through Discord, this session sparked engaging discussions about the future of mobile development in Nepal and the role of AI in shaping user experiences.

title: AWS Cloud Workshop
description: Hands-on AWS Cloud Workshop covering Introduction to Cloud Computing, IAM, Amazon S3, and EC2. Partnership with AWS Cloud Club Nepal.

fullDescription.heading: About the Workshop
fullDescription.content: In partnership with AWS Cloud Club Nepal, we organized a comprehensive hands-on workshop introducing students to Amazon Web Services and cloud computing fundamentals.

fullDescription.heading: Workshop Modules
fullDescription.content:
Introduction to Cloud Computing concepts
AWS account setup and navigation
Identity and Access Management (IAM)
Amazon S3 for object storage
EC2 instances and virtual servers
Security best practices
Cost optimization strategies

fullDescription.heading: Hands-on Learning
fullDescription.content: Participants got hands-on experience creating and managing AWS resources. Each attendee worked through practical exercises, deploying their own applications and learning industry-standard cloud practices.

fullDescription.heading: Partnership
fullDescription.content: This workshop was made possible through our partnership with AWS Cloud Club Nepal, demonstrating our commitment to bringing quality technical education to students at NCIT.

fullDescription.heading: Outcomes
fullDescription.content: Over 80 students gained practical cloud computing skills that are directly applicable to their academic projects and future careers. Many participants expressed interest in pursuing AWS certifications after the workshop.
